Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Central/Harrison
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Central/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Central/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.
